response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which I believe will significantly enhance the value and functionality of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and the unique benefits it offers, I am confident it will be a valuable addition to your business. Considering its intrinsic worth and the potential impact it can have on your endeavors, I am extending an exclusive offer to purchase this product for $1,150,000. This price reflects a strategic compromise aimed at ensuring both parties benefit from this transaction. I look forward to discussing the details further and exploring how we can collaborate to achieve mutual success.", "product_price": 1150000}
